   contain the root `toctree` directive.

BuildingsPy's documentation
===========================

*BuildingsPy* is a `Python <http://www.python.org/>`_ 
package that can be used to process ``*.mat`` output files 
that were generated by 
`Dymola <http://www.3ds.com/products/catia/portfolio/dymola>`_
or 
`OpenModelica <http://www.openmodelica.org/>`_. 
The package provides functions
to extract data series from the output file for 
further use in the python packages 
`matplotlib <http://matplotlib.sourceforge.net/>`_
for plotting and
`SciPy <http://www.scipy.org/>`_ for scientific computing.

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   buildingspy
   legal
   acknowledgments
